channel.title: Blogs on SDS348 Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on SDS348 Portfolio

item.title: Coding with Python and Rstudio
item.description: In this blog post, I’ll be using Python and Rstudio to code! It’s pretty cool how we can pull from both to create a functioning code. #this is my R code #install.packages("reticulate", repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org") library(reticulate) Sys.setenv(RETICULATE_PYTHON="/usr/bin/python") use_python("/usr/bin/python") course1 <- "SDS348" #this is my python code course1 = "This semester I am taking computational biology, course number" print(course1+ " " +r.course1+".") ## This semester I am taking computational biology, course number SDS348.

item.title: Hello
item.description: Hello all, Thanks for checking out my blog post! Hope you are liking my website. Here are some cool things I’ve been doing in quarantine: baking, running, listening to podcasts, and finding new music. I’ve made banana bread and earl grey tea yogurt bread, hit a new personal record for my mileage distance, learned a lot from Brene Brown’s podcasts, and found some really cool music on SoundCloud!! Hope everyone’s doing well and keeping safe!
